column4: hello, I'm trying to conect a pocket pc to my pc, and trying to know if it is recognized, following a how to in the forum I tryed to use the command "ls /dev" and watch for any changes between when the device is and isn't connected, but nothing changes here, any idea of what problem it is?
try doing dmesg|tail to see if anything got picked up.
there are no pocket pc related events in dmesg|tail
is it usb? if so, were there any usb-related events?
it  is usb (is a pretty new ppc )
I'll paste in pastebin the result ok?
http://paste.ubuntubrasil.org/742 (the other pastebin (in english is laggin)
weird. and you say that you'd already checked for a new device in /dev?
I did the commands : ls /dev > /tmp/before  then ls /dev > /tmp/after  then diff /tmp/before /tmp/after

ok...i'm really sorry but that's about all i've got. you should perhaps do a search on http://www.ubuntuforums.org for pocket-pc or something...if you can't find anything, posting there will get you some attention :-)
thanks (for the time you spent/sorry bad english)a lot anyway
